name: Dark Witch Music Episode: Rudymical
overview: Jump and Slash to the rhythm! Dark Witch Music: Rudymical now on Nintendo Switch! Play the 1 player STORY MODE and defeat all the bosses! Play the VS MODE to battle 1 VS 1 against your friends, and the CO-OP MODE for 2-player team play! High quality graphics true to the original Dark Witch Story, quality music composed by Raito, and beautiful illustrations.
